sio.title: Sell Overseas - Expand your sales globally
sio.description: By inserting our JavaScript tag on your own e-commerce site, foreign customers can approach your products and buy them immediately from your platform. Ezbuy Japan will receive inquiries from overseas customers and handle international payment & shipping.

b2b.title: B2B Wholesale eCommerce Service
b2b.description: Ezbuy Japan has strong connections with over 100 domestic Japanese brands and acts as a global distributor. Our B2B wholesale service helps place bulk orders, negotiate prices, and shorten the lead time for importing goods from Japan.

dropshipping.title: End-to-End Dropshipping Solution
dropshipping.description: Negotiate & purchase products directly from sellers in Japan at lower prices. Safe storage of inventory 24/7. Rapid processing and shipping of your order on the same day.

xBorderEcommerce.title: Cross-border eCommerce
xBorderEcommerce.description: Ezbuy's cross-border eCommerce service offers a seamless and convenient Japanese shopping experience via the Janbox eCommerce platform, ensuring authentic products, competitive prices, and reduced shipping times

xBorderShipping.title: Cross-border Shipping
xBorderShipping.description: International shipping service from Japan to over 220 countries by air and sea. Secure packaging, customs clearance support, and real-time shipment tracking.

warehouseFulfillment.title: Japan Warehouse Fulfillment
warehouseFulfillment.description: Fast order processing, immediate packing and shipping, helping businesses control and minimize inventory through OMS.

airFreight.title: Air freight & Customs clearance
airFreight.description: Ezbuy Japan offers air freight services that maximize shipping speed while ensuring reasonable costs, with 24/7 tracking available.

sellInVietNam.title: Sell in Viet Nam
sellInVietNam.description: With sell in Vietnam service, Ezbuy Japan helps Japanese businesses register their operations, open online stores in Vietnam, and integrate with the largest e-commerce platforms. The fulfillment network manages inventory and business operations more efficiently.

sellInJapan.title: Sell in Japan
sellInJapan.description: Ezbuy Japan supports foreigners who wish to sell in Japan by assisting with legal procedures, providing warehouse fulfillment services, and partnering with top reputable shipping companies, ensuring you can operate your business in Japan with peace of mind.

caseStudies.title: Ezbuy Customer Success Stories: Cross-Border Ecommerce Fulfillment Made Easy
caseStudies.des: Explore inspiring stories from Ezbuy customers who have achieved seamless international shipping and business growth with our fulfillment solutions.

contentWhoWeAre1: Ezbuy Japan Joint Stock Company (Ezbuy Japan JSC)
was founded in 2020 in Tokyo, Japan.
aboutUs.contentWhoWeAre2: With a long-term vision for sustainable growth, we focus on building one-stop solutions that empower the global e-commerce industry.
aboutUs.contentWhoWeAre3: We desire to become a bridge bringing the quintessence of Japan to countries all over the world and a companion of business thriving in the land of the rising sun.
aboutUs.contentWhoWeAre4: With world-class technology, cross-border expertise, and deep local insight, we’re proud to be the bridge between Japan and the world.”
aboutUs.contentTradingName: Ezbuy Japan Joint Stock Company (Ezbuy Japan ., Jsc)
aboutUs.contentOfficeInVietnam: No. 8, Le Quang Dao, Nam Tu Liem, Hanoi
aboutUs.contentMission: Our mission is to become a reliable partner in the world of e-commerce, connecting Japan with nations across the globe. We pave the shortest and smoothest path for businesses to achieve success by offering comprehensive e-commerce services driven by cutting-edge technology.
aboutUs.contentVision: With the vision of becoming the leading cross-border eCommerce enabler for both sellers and buyers, Ezbuy Japan strives to provide comprehensive Cross-border eCommerce solutions, powered by world-class technology, outstanding expertise, and a passion for serving clients to help businesses unlock growth potential.
aboutUs.statementContent1: Ezbuy Japan owns the advantages of great technology and a team of experts with years of experience. The company has transformed from a cross-border e-commerce platform to an end-to-end e-commerce enabler for foreigners in Japan. We have strongly developed in the fields of fulfillment, warehouse and selling in Japan. With the motto 'Customer at the center', we always strive to improve service quality to be better every day.
aboutUs.statementContent2: However, there is no road of flowers leading to glory. To gain the above achievements, Ezbuy Japan has overcome difficult times, of which 2021 is a prime example when the COVID-19 strains seriously impact the global economy and trade. The lower income leads to a narrowing of people's purchasing numbers. However, from another perspective, demand is often proportional to people's income, so it can be expected that when income increases in the 'new normal', the level of consumption will increase sharply.
aboutUs.statementContent3: In 2023, with the motto of 5B: Be consistent in goals - Be good at risk control - Be not afraid of change - Be alert for opportunities - Be sustainable in connection, Ezbuy Japan team will strive to make breakthroughs, create momentum for the next five-year strategic period of 2023-2028. On the basis of promoting the achievements of the previous period, as long as exploiting the potential to bring the brand and scale of Ezbuy Japan growing stronger towards the goal of Top 5 leading e-commerce enabler companies in Japan.
aboutUs.contentOurStrengths: Discover what makes Ezbuy Japan become one of the premier eCommerce enablers for foreign businesses in Japan.

slider.contentFastCrossBorderForwarding: Ezbuy Japan advanced and modern transportation system is able to meet transportation needs. Averaging 5 flights/week ensures the delivery of goods to every destination around the world on time.
slider.contentHighDensityLogisticsNetwork: In addition to owning a system of large Cross-Docking and Bonded warehouses in Japan, the US, and Vietnam. Ezbuy Japan also links and expands a huge logistics network from partners globally to ensure the secure storage of goods and driving down shipping costs in the long run.
slider.contentRealTimeOrderTracking: We push shipping information from multi-carriers into our united dashboard via API, enabling customers to easily view and track orders from initial acceptance to the shipment of the finished goods in real-time.
slider.contentFlexibleWholesaleECommerce: Spend less when businesses buy wholesale products with Ezbuy Japan. We can bargain and negotiate with Japanese sellers to offer different pricing tiers, with lower prices for your larger orders.
slider.contentSmoothFastCustomsClearance: Offer digital customs declaration documents that can be filled in on the website, with additional documents available to download on demand. This contributes to avoiding errors and making the entire customs process more secure, transparent and visible at all steps.
slider.contentSameDayOrderFulfillment: Accurately and fast handle orders on the same day as soon as your customers place orders, based on detailed data from our word-class order management system integrating with the top Japanese e-commerce sites.
slider.contentSellInJapan: A-to-Z supports merchants in penetrating, selling, and thriving in the Japanese market from creating selling accounts, storing inventory, and processing orders to delivering to customers in the next day.

aboutUs.contentOurCulture: Step into our company's vibrant culture - where creativity, camaraderie, brave, passion and Japanese culture intertwine to create an extraordinary workplace experience.
aboutUs.contentInnovationCreativity: We are learning incessantly from customers, partners, and our own colleagues to think outside the box, striving to lead in new technologies, new products, and new management methods.
aboutUs.contentSharing: At Ezbuy Japan, we give prominence to the culture of sharing. We believe that a strong sense of the sharing culture’s value allows Ezbuy Japan to maintain and develop a common community and corporate culture.
aboutUs.dareToThinkDareToAct: Dare to think, dare to act
aboutUs.contentDareToThinkDareToAct: We set a goal and take steps to achieve that goal at the same time. It’s the “dare to think” spirit that maximizes the working capacity of each member & the “dare to act” that gives us the endless energy to fulfill the mission & create valuable beauty. Satisfying customers is all that matters.
aboutUs.contentUpholdPromoteJapaneseTradition: Ezbuy Japan always upholds the positive and effective working spirit of the Japanese. We always strive to learn and encourage our employees to promote the good traditional values of the nation.
aboutUs.contentTeamwork: At Ezbuy Japan, all members are cared for. We give each other support & work as a team towards a common goal “the satisfaction of customers & the company’s long-lasting growth”.
aboutUs.contentTrustSecurity: Our commitment to safeguarding customer privacy and data security.
aboutUs.contentDataProtection: Implementing robust measures to safeguard customer data and ensure its confidentiality.
aboutUs.contentSecureTransactions: Utilizing industry-standard encryption protocols to protect customer information during online transactions.
aboutUs.contentLimitedAccess: Restricting access to customer data only to authorized personnel, ensuring confidentiality and preventing unauthorized use.
aboutUs.contentComplianceWithRegulations: Adhering to all relevant privacy laws and regulations in Japan to ensure the protection of customer rights.
aboutUs.contentTransparency: Providing clear and concise information about our data collection and usage practices, empowering customers to make informed choices.
aboutUs.contentSecureInfrastructure: Employing robust technological infrastructure and implementing stringent security protocols to prevent unauthorized access and data breaches.

heading: Automated
warehouse fulfillment
subHeading: With our cutting-edge warehouse management system and experienced team, we guarantee seamless order processing, packing, and shipping, so you can focus on what matters most - growing your business!
Say goodbye to the headaches of inventory management and logistics, as we take care of it all for you.
contents: Do you own an online store with a growing range of products, but don't want the hassle of handling warehouse fulfillment?
Do you wish to offer 2-day fast shipping for your orders?
Or maybe you want to free up some space and leave the hassle of packing and shipping products to someone else?

whyChooseEzbuy.heading: Why choose Ezbuy Japan’s fulfillment
whyChooseEzbuy.subHeading: With our exceptional fulfillment solution, you can effortlessly manage all your orders while selling goods in Japan.
solutionContents: Ezbuy Japan's fulfillment centers are equipped with advanced technology and efficient processes to handle order processing quickly and accurately. This ensures that customer orders are picked, packed and shipped promptly.
With an extensive network and partnerships with various shipping carriers, Ezbuy Japan can negotiate competitive shipping rates, saving businesses money on shipping costs.

Ezbuy Japan's fulfillment centers ensure that products are professionally packed and protected during transit, reducing the likelihood of damage during shipping and improving overall customer experience.

We integrate with various eCommerce platforms, making it seamless for businesses to sync their online stores with Ezbuy Japan's fulfillment system.This integration simplifies inventory management and order tracking.

With multiple fulfillment centers strategically located, Ezbuy Japan can efficiently distribute products across various regions. This allows businesses to reach customers faster and reduce shipping costs.

Ezbuy Japan handles the returns process in the warehouse efficiently, making it easier for businesses to process returns and refunds, which is crucial for maintaining customer satisfaction and building trust.

contents.title: Receiving
contents.des: Send your inventory to one of our warehouse.

contents.title: Put-away
contents.des: Move items from the receiving dock and classify the placement of goods to enable fast and accurate picking.

contents.title: Picking and packing
contents.des: We pick, pack orders and get them ready to send customers.

contents.title: Shipping
contents.des: Send goods to the customers and ensure that they are delivered safely and on time.

contents.title: Returns
contents.des: Returned orders come back to our fulfilment centres for processing

storage.heading: Storage
storage.subHeading: Observe how we proactively optimize our warehouse for your storage requirements

contents.title: Area
contents.subTitle: Spacious storage facilities
contents.des: Our warehouse Fulfillment service offers ample and secure storage space to accommodate your growing inventory. With a well-organized layout, we ensure easy access and retrieval of products, making order fulfillment a breeze.

contents.title: Price
contents.subTitle: Cost-effective storage solutions
contents.des: With our Warehouse Fulfillment service, you can save on overhead costs associated with maintaining your storage facility. Our flexible pricing options allow you to pay only for the space and services you require.

contents.title: Safety
contents.subTitle: High-security storage
contents.des: Your products are in safe hands. Our warehouse is equipped with state-of-the-art security measures, including surveillance cameras, access control systems and 24/7 on-site monitoring, providing a secure environment for your valuable merchandise.

contents.title: Temperature
contents.subTitle: Climate-controlled storage
contents.des: Protect your sensitive or perishable goods with our climate-controlled storage options. We maintain optimal temperature and humidity levels to preserve the quality of your products, giving you peace of mind.

contents.title: Personalization
contents.subTitle: Customized storage solutions
contents.des: We understand that each business is unique. Our Warehouse Fulfillment service offers customizable storage solutions to meet your specific needs. Whether it's bulk storage, pallet racking, or shelving, we tailor our services to align with your requirements.

inventory.heading: Inventory Management (on OMS)
inventory.subHeading: See how we apply an advanced inventory management system to keep track of every item stored in the warehouse.

contents.title: Multi-warehouse management
contents.des: If you have multiple warehouses or fulfillment centers, our OMS can efficiently manage inventory across all locations. This helps reduce shipping costs and improves order fulfillment efficiency.

contents.title: Real-time inventory tracking
contents.des: Ezbuy Japan's OMS provides real-time updates on your inventory levels. You can effortlessly monitor stock quantities, ensuring you have accurate information for smooth warehouse fulfillment.

contents.title: Automated stock reordering
contents.des: With our OMS, you can set up automatic reorder points for products. When inventory reaches a specified threshold, the system generates purchase orders or restocking alerts, preventing stockouts and optimizing inventory levels.

contents.title: Centralized inventory control
contents.des: OMS serves as a centralized hub for managing inventory across multiple sales channels. Whether you sell through your website, marketplaces, or physical stores, you can keep track of all stock movements from a single platform.

contents.title: FIFO (First-In-First-Out) System
contents.des: For products with expiration dates or limited shelf life, we implement a FIFO system to ensure older items are dispatched first, reducing the risk of product obsolescence and wastage.

facilities.heading: Warehouse Facilities
facilities.subHeading: Explore our top-notch warehouse facilities, where efficiency meets excellence to safeguard and optimize your valuable inventory

valueAdded.heading: Value-added services
valueAdded.subHeading: Ezbuy Japan provides extra services to elevate your business, ensuring efficient operation and delighted customers.

contents.title: Customized packaging
contents.des: We provide personalized packaging options, such as gift wrapping and branded packaging, which elevate the customer experience and add a touch of exclusivity to the products.

contents.title: Product labeling and barcoding
contents.des: Accurate and efficient product labeling and barcoding are critical to ensure smooth inventory tracking and quick order processing

contents.title: Product repackaging
contents.des: Some products might need repackaging to comply with local regulations or to create more efficient packaging for shipping. We offer this service to streamline the process for their customers.

contents.title: Returns processing & refurbishment
contents.des: Ezbuy Japan handles product returns efficiently. We offer inspection, testing and refurbishment services, making the returned items suitable for resale while minimizing waste.

partner.heading: Partners & Networks
partner.subHeading: Our warehouse fulfillment service in Japan leverages a robust network of partners, ensuring streamlined operations, faster delivery and superior customer satisfaction.

banner.heading: Cross-border eCommerce
banner.subHeading: Via the Janbox eCommerce platform, Ezbuy Japan enables international customers to shop over 7 million products in Japan with superior solutions, offering unique features like online auctions, last-minute hunting, and bargain buying. It's more than just a 'Click to buy' experience.

whyChooseEzbuy.heading: Why choose us?
whyChooseEzbuy.subHeading: Choose us for a seamless cross-border eCommerce experience - where shopping from Japan becomes a breeze no matter where you are. We bring an eCommerce world of convenience, unbeatable variety and hassle-free delivery to your doorstep
solutionContents: Our platform offers an extensive range of products directly sourced from Japan, providing you access to a diverse and authentic selection that caters to your unique preferences and needs.

We have direct partnerships with reputable Japanese eCommerce platforms to ensure the authenticity of the products, providing you with peace of mind and confidence in your cross-border shopping experience.

We strive to offer competitive service charges on all eCommerce sites, allowing you to enjoy the best of Japan's offerings at affordable rates, making cross-border shopping an economical and rewarding choice.
Ezbuy Japan has established reliable shipping networks to ensure hassle-free and timely delivery of your orders from Japan to your doorstep, eliminating the worries of complex cross-border logistics.
Our dedicated customer support team is fluent in multiple languages, providing you with assistance and guidance throughout your shopping journey, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable experience.
We prioritize your security and privacy, offering a range of secure payment options for your cross-border purchases, safeguarding your financial information and transactions.
Our experienced team manages all customs procedures and documentation, minimizing potential delays and ensuring a swift customs clearance process for your orders.
Looking for a specific product from Japan? Our personalized shopping assistance service helps you find and acquire rare or unique items, turning your cross-border shopping dreams into reality.

features.heading: Features of service
features.subHeading: Explore distinctive and standout features that make Ezbuy Japan different apart from others

contents.title: Online bidding
items: Enable worldwide customers to participate in auctions on major Japanese websites like Yahoo Auction, Mercari,...
Allow users to monitor the bidding status in real time and adjust their bid amounts as needed
VIP auction function offers the opportunity to bid on products before others and pay later when winning the auction.

contents.title: Sniper Bid
items: Help customers place bids automatically, saving time and ensuring the highest bid without exceeding your budget.
Bid confidently with Ezbuy's calculated offers, avoiding overbidding and maximizing cost efficiency.

contents.title: Quick order
items: Copying the product URL into the "Quick order" speeds up the purchasing process by avoiding manual product details entry.
Using the URL reduces the risk of incorrect product information, ensuring customers get the intended items from the Japanese website.

contents.title: Integrate multiple payment methods
items: Accept payments across any gateway, geography or currency without any additional integration effort.
Regularly monitor payment trends, customer feedback, and industry developments to update and  optimize the payment experience for customers.

contents.title: Return and refund easily
items: Offer easy and straightforward return and refund policies for customers
Create clear and simple return procedures with step-by-step instructions and tracking options to enhance the shopping experience.
Process refunds promptly and keep customers updated on the status, ensuring trust and satisfaction.

contents.title: Customer support for different time zones
items: Offer 24/7 customer support to cater to customers in different time zones and ensure assistance is available when you need us.
Provide customer support in multiple languages to bridge the communication gap and effectively assist international customers.

contents.title: Duties and taxes calculator
items: Help customers estimate the import duties and taxes they may incur when buying from Japan
Categorize products to calculate duties and taxes accurately based on the respective customs classifications and rates for each item.
Provide real-time currency conversion to display estimated duties and taxes in the customer's preferred currency.

contents.des: Customers contact with our customer success team to register and create their accounts.

contents.des: Discuss with foreign customers, helping them understand the processes and regulations when buying from Japan.

contents.des: We will verify the customer's information and confirms your accounts for authenticity and security.

contents.title: Selecting product
contents.des: Customers shop around eCommerce sites in Japan, select the products they want to buy & add them to their shopping carts.

contents.title: Processing payment
contents.des: Customers can securely process payments in various currencies and payment methods, ensuring a smooth and reliable transaction.

contents.title: Delivery
contents.des: Collaborate with famous shipping partners to ensure safe and efficient shipping from Japan to more than 220 countries and religion.

contents.title: Post-sales support
contents.des: The service provides post-sales support, including handling product exchanges/returns and resolving any arising issues.

banner.heading: Fast & Reliable Cross-border Shipping
banner.subHeading: Ezbuy Japan offers international delivery by air and sea from Japan to over 220 countries. We provide various shipping methods and optional services to ensure your goods' timely delivery, cost-effectiveness, and package safety. With our comprehensive shipping and tracking solutions, we can perfectly meet all your needs

whyChooseEzbuy.heading: Why choose us?
whyChooseEzbuy.subHeading: Experience the convenience of global shopping from Japan with Ezbuy Japan's Cross-border shipping service.
solutionContents: Our cross-border shipping service enables you to reach customers and partners worldwide. Ezbuy Japan has an extensive network of international shipping routes, ensuring your shipments can reach virtually any destination across the globe.

We understand that different shipments have unique requirements. Therefore, we offer a range of shipping options, including express, standard and economy services, allowing you to choose the one that best suits your needs and budget.

Navigating customs regulations and procedures can be complex and time-consuming. Ezbuy Japan provides dedicated customs clearance assistance, ensuring all necessary paperwork is accurately prepared and processed, helping to avoid potential customs-related issues.

We offer advanced tracking and monitoring systems, allowing you to keep a close eye on your shipments status in real-time. This transparency gives you peace of mind and allows you to provide accurate updates to your customers or recipients.

Our cross-border shipping service is designed to be cost-effective without compromising on quality. We optimize shipping routes, consolidate shipments where possible and negotiate competitive rates with carriers, passing on the cost savings to our customers.

Time-sensitive shipments need reliable and swift service. We prioritize on-time deliveries and work closely with trusted carriers to ensure your goods reach their destination promptly and efficiently.

International shipments are subjected to various handling conditions during transit. We take utmost care in packaging and handling your goods to minimize the risk of damage or loss during transportation.

Our customer support team is available to assist you at every step of the shipping process. Whether you have questions about documentation, customs or tracking, we are here to provide prompt and helpful assistance.

With years of experience in cross-border logistics, Ezbuy Japan has developed a deep understanding of international shipping regulations, customs procedures, and documentation requirements. Our expertise ensures smooth and hassle-free shipping, reducing the risk of delays and errors.

valueAdded.heading: Value-added services
valueAdded.subHeading: Experience the difference with value-added services in cross-border shipping, ensuring smooth and rewarding international deliveries

contents.title: Package consolidation
contents.des: Package consolidation offers customers a cost-saving solution on international shipping. Moreover, consolidating packages helps the receiving stage more convenient and easier. You can receive them at once instead of multiple times.

contents.title: Language support and documentation translation
contents.des: Offer multilingual support to assist customers with communication, paperwork, and documentation needed for international shipping, making it easier for them to understand and comply with regulations.

contents.title: Protective packaging service
contents.des: To ensure that the items are not damaged during international shipping, we suggest you use a protective packaging service to minimize unwanted package risks.

contents.title: Global fulfillment solution
contents.des: Help businesses manage cross-border e-commerce operations by offering warehousing, order fulfillment, and last-mile delivery services in Japan and other target markets.

contents.title: Insurance services
contents.des: We partner with insurance providers to offer shipping insurance options, protecting customers against potential loss or damage during transit.

newUser.heading: For new users
newUser.subHeading: Discover essential tips and helpful guidelines tailored for new users to ensure a smooth and seamless experience with our cross-border shipping service.

contents.title: Check customs regulations
contents.des: Familiarize yourself with the customs regulations and requirements of both the exporting and importing countries. Ensure your shipments comply with all necessary documentation and restrictions.

contents.title: Proper packaging
contents.des: Invest in secure and appropriate packaging to protect your goods during international transit. Consider any specific packaging requirements for fragile or sensitive items.

contents.title: Accurate documentation
contents.des: Double-check all shipping documents, including commercial invoices and packing lists, to ensure accuracy and avoid delays during customs clearance.

contents.title: Shipping options
contents.des: Explore the various shipping options available, considering factors such as speed, cost, and tracking capabilities. Choose the method that best suits your needs.

contents.title: Insurance coverage
contents.des: Consider insuring your shipments to safeguard against potential loss or damage during transit. Understand the insurance coverage and claims process.

contents.title: Address accuracy
contents.des: Provide complete and accurate recipient addresses to prevent delivery delays or misplacements.

shipment.heading: Create a shipment
shipment.subHeading: Creating a cross-border shipment is a pivotal process that initiates sending goods between countries. It involves crucial actions and documentation for smooth and efficient delivery. Here's an overview.

solutionContents: The sender (shipper) placing an order to send goods to a recipient (consignee) in another country. The shipper provides essential details such as the destination address, item description, quantity, and value.

Cross-border shipping involves adherence to customs regulations and requirements of both the exporting and importing countries. The shipper must ensure that the goods comply with all relevant customs laws, tariffs, and restrictions.

Proper packing and labeling are essential for secure transportation. The shipper carefully packages the items, ensuring they are adequately protected and labeled with all necessary information, including shipping labels and customs documentation.

To move the shipment through customs and across international borders, the shipper must complete various shipping documents. This paperwork includes the commercial invoice, packing list, certificate of origin, and any other specific documentation required by the destination country

The shipper chooses the appropriate shipping method based on factors such as cost, speed, and the nature of the goods. They also select a reliable carrier experienced in cross-border logistics to handle the transportation.
The shipper arranges for payment of shipping charges, taxes, and any applicable duties. They may also opt for cargo insurance to protect against potential loss or damage during transit.

We offer tracking capabilities, allowing both the shipper and recipient to monitor the shipment's progress in real-time. This visibility ensures transparency and keeps both parties informed about the estimated delivery date.
Once the shipment reaches the destination country, it undergoes customs clearance. This process involves inspection, verification of documentation, and payment of any applicable duties or taxes.
After customs clearance, the shipment is released for final delivery to the recipient's address. The carrier handles the last-mile delivery to ensure the goods reach the consignee safely and on time.

whyChooseCustoms.heading: Why choose Ezbuy Japan customs clearance
whyChooseCustoms.subHeading: Say goodbye to complex paperwork, delays and uncertainty as Ezbuy Japan handle the intricate customs process for your business.
solutionContents: Ezbuy Japan boasts a team of customs clearance professionals with extensive experience and in-depth knowledge of customs regulations. We navigate the complexities of customs procedures on your behalf, ensuring accurate and efficient clearance.

By entrusting your customs clearance to Ezbuy Japan, you save valuable time and effort that you can redirect toward core business activities. The intricacies of paperwork and procedures are handled by experts, allowing you to focus on what matters most.

Ezbuy's wide network and established relationships with customs authorities worldwide facilitate smooth clearances across various countries. Whether you're importing from Japan or any other country, Ezbuy's expertise extends globally.

Ezbuy Japan understands that each import situation is unique. Our customs clearance services are customized to your specific needs, ensuring that you receive solutions that align with your business requirements.

Language barriers can be a challenge when dealing with customs procedures. Ezbuy Japan provides multilingual support, ensuring effective communication with customs authorities and a smooth clearance process

proxyPayment.title: Proxy Payment

authorizedPayment.title: What is Proxy Payment service?
authorizedPayment.meaningServicePay: is a service that allows international customers to make purchases from eligible merchants using the “Cash on Delivery“ method. When placing an order, please select “Cash on delivery“ (代金引換 in Japanese) as the payment method, and provide your delivery address.
authorizedPayment.charges: The fee for each proxy payment order is 3% of the product price (minimum 300 yen).

note.title: Note:
note.complete: and complete identity verification to use this service.
note.service: * Service only applies to eligible stores.

proxyPayment.procedure: Procedure for using our Proxy Payment service

stepOne.title: Register
stepOne.description: Customers register to use the Proxy Payment service with Ezbuy Japan.

stepTwo.title: Purchase
stepTwo.description: When shopping at an eligible store, please select “Cash on Delivery” as your payment method and provide your delivery address.

stepThree.title: Pay on behalf
stepThree.description: When your order arrives at Ezbuy Japan warehouse, we will pay the delivery company for the goods and domestic shipping fees on your behalf.

stepFour.title: Wait for delivery
stepFour.description: We will charge the Product price and Proxy Payment fee to your credit card. After payment is completed, the product will be delivered to your address.

proxyPayment.listStoreSub: Our Proxy Payment service is only available to eligible shops.

questionOne.question: In what currency will my credit card be charged?
questionOne.answer: Your credit card will be charged in Japanese yen.

questionTwo.question: Is there a maximum limit for using this service?
questionTwo.answer: Yes. The maximum amount per order is 30,000 yen.

questionThree.question: Do I have to pay additional fees to use this service?
questionThree.answer: Yes. The fee to use this service is 3% of the product price (minimum 300 yen).

questionFour.question: Can I use this service at all stores?
questionFour.answer: No. This service is only available at stores marked as eligible.

questionFive.question: What credit cards does Ezbuy Japan’s accept?

questionSix.question: In which areas does this service apply?
questionSix.answer: This service is available in all regions where Ezbuy Japan’s accepts cross-border shipping.

customerStory.heading: Customer success story
customerStory.subHeading: See how our customers start their business with Fulfillment by Ezbuy?

content.subtitle: EZBUY brings us great business time from all aspects
content.name: Mrs. Ngan Tran
content.bio: Deputy Head of Operations at Janbox
content.content: We have chosen EZBUY as our fulfillment partner and couldn't be happier with this decision. They not only help us reduce shipping costs but also provide an efficient and reliable warehouse management process. EZBUY team is always ready to support and solve any issue quickly.

content.subtitle: EZBUY is one of the most thoughtful partner that we've ever cooperated
content.name: Mr. Dang Minh
content.bio: Head of Business Department at Ship60
content.content: EZBUY is one of the most thoughtful partner that we've ever cooperated

content.subtitle: The fulfillment savior named EZBUY
content.name: Mr. Akira Napap
content.content: We had big issues with inventory. But that ended when we found EZBUY. The ability to effectively manage and allocate inventory at high accuracy is what we have been looking for for a long time.
